title: Fish price UP at Mirissa fish market
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Fish prices in Mirissa have increased due to the current economic situation in the country.
It is reported that fishermen have not been able to engage in their trade due to the shortage of fuel, as well as gas.
At present a kilogram of Tuna is being sold for Rs. 1,100/- at the Mirissa Market.
